thread.title: Sushant Singh Rajput has become a fitness freak and we just can’t stop obsessing over his hot bod!
thread.title_full: Sushant Singh Rajput has become a fitness freak and we just can’t stop obsessing over his hot bod!

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Sushant Singh Rajput has become a fitness freak and we just can’t stop obsessing over his hot bod!
text:
Sushant Singh Rajput's childhood pictures are too cute to handle 
Sushant Singh Rajput has found a new obsession and we must say we are quite liking it… Sushant has suddenly become a fitness freak now, not that he wasn’t fit before, but from what it looks like, he is spending most of his time working out and it’s sort of amazing. Why? Because he keeps coming up with these different workout videos which would make you want to get up and hit the gym ASAP! The young lot of actors including Tiger Shroff, Sidharth Malhotra, Varun Dhawan and now Sushant are extremely passionate about their workouts. If you fall under that category of people who find excuses to skip gym everyday, you MUST watch SSR’s workout videos. Check them out right here.. (ALSO READ: Sushant Singh Rajput goes from cute to savage in just two Instagram posts ) 
— Sushant Singh Rajput (@itsSSR) January 23, 2017 
Training Day #1 
— Sushant Singh Rajput (@itsSSR) January 24, 2017 Dear Hardwork, 
— Sushant Singh Rajput (@itsSSR) January 24, 2017 

— Sushant Singh Rajput (@itsSSR) January 30, 2017 
Quite inspiring, aren’t they? 
As we said before, the MS Dhoni actor has always been really fit but with these workout videos, he has taken fitness to another level.. So all you guys out there who are looking for some motivation, Sushant Singh Rajput is here to your rescue. Ever since his break up with Ankita Lokhande, Sushant has been in the news for his alleged love affair with Kriti Sanon. They are both even doing a film together Raabta which is releasing in June this year. Neither Sushant nor Kriti have ever come out in open about their love affair but c’mon there is no smoke without fire, guys! Quite a few times Kriti and Sushant have been spotted outside each other’s residence in Bombay and not just that, they ringed in this New Year’s together. So isn’t it quite obvious that something’s cooking between the two? 
Now that SSR too has joined the bandwagon of actors who are aiming to have a hot bod, we would love to know from you guys who is your personal favourite. Tiger, Varun, Sidharth or Sushant – who do you think has the perfect gym bod? Tell us your views in the comments section below.
